Hey There Spades Fans!
This version is especially exciting! Dwyane Wade’s here to join the fun!!!
- Yes, Spades Royale is NOW WITH DWYANE WADE! Come join Dwyane in the #1 Spades App out there!
- Enjoy the new arenas and see if you can earn the gems!

See you at the tables!
